verses.verse: For the director.[b] Of David. The fool says in his heart,[c] “There is no God.” People are depraved and their deeds are vile; there is no one who does what is right.
The LORD[d] looks down from heaven upon the entire human race, to see if there are any who act with wisdom, if even a single one seeks God.
But they have all left the right path; all alike are corrupt. There is no one who does what is right, not even one.[e]
Have all these evildoers[f] no understanding? They devour my people as they eat bread, and they never call upon the LORD.
But later they will be filled with terror, for God is on the side of the righteous.[g]
They sought to crush the hopes of the poor,[h] but the LORD is their refuge.
Who will accomplish the salvation of Israel that is to come out of Zion?[i] When the LORD restores the fortunes of his people, Jacob will rejoice and Israel will exult.
